sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fix script checks if KMF instance keys are available  and then sets opt_in value in property glide_encryption.cle_replatforming_with_kmf. This is the new fix script for "Check KMF keys for CLE and set opt_in"</description>
        <name>set opt_in and start key migration</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var skipMigrationPropertyName = "glide_cle_skip_migration_on_upgrade";
	var skipMigrationPropertyDefault = false; // Perform the migration on upgrade by default.
	var skipMigration = gs.getProperty(skipMigrationPropertyName, skipMigrationPropertyDefault);
	if ('false' != skipMigration) {
		gs.log("Skipping CLE migration jobs per property: " + skipMigrationPropertyName);
		return;
	}

	var jobMigration = new SNC.JobMigrationOrchestrator(30, 240);
	jobMigration.setRollbackAllowed();
	var shouldAllowAutoMigration = jobMigration.shouldAllowAutoMigration();
	if (!shouldAllowAutoMigration){
		gs.log("Skipping CLE migration jobs since CLE replatforming property set to opt_out or rollback.");
		return;
	}
		
	var status = jobMigration.startCLEMigrationIfNecessary();
	gs.info('Platform Encryption Plugin installation - Add the Migration Job:' + status);
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-09-22 20:09:18</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>24fb7f5e5302111046edddeeff7b12fa</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>set opt_in and start key migration</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">d6375ef01b8a21109c18a9f9bc4bcb45</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_24fb7f5e5302111046edddeeff7b12fa</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-09-30 20:47:36</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: set opt_in and start key migration
